marketplaces.name: xorphitus-plugins
marketplaces.description: Jujutsu (jj) version control plugin providing a specialist agent and skills for commits, diffs, rebasing, bookmarks, workspace management, and more.

files.README.md:
# claude-code-marketplace
Local installation example:

```bash
claude plugin marketplace add /path/to/claude-code-marketplace
claude plugin install --scope local jj-plugin
```

plugins.name: jj-plugin
plugins.description: Jujutsu (jj) version control plugin providing a specialist agent and skills for commits, diffs, rebasing, bookmarks, workspace management, and more.

plugins.name: spec-plugin
plugins.description: Pre-implementation specification agent that investigates codebases, asks clarifying questions, and produces clear requirement specs.
